Module lanat
Package lanat.parsing

Class Tokenizer

java.lang.Object
lanat.utils.errors.ErrorContainerImpl<T>
lanat.parsing.ParsingStateBase<Error.TokenizeError>
lanat.parsing.Tokenizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ErrorContainer<Error.TokenizeError>, Resettable
public final class Tokenizer extends ParsingStateBase<Error.TokenizeError>
Tokenizes the input string given. When finished, the tokens can be retrieved using getFinalTokens()

  • Method Details

    • tokenize

      public void tokenize(@NotNull @NotNull String input, @Nullable @Nullable Tokenizer previousTokenizer)
      Tokenizes the input string given. When finished, the tokens can be retrieved using getFinalTokens()
      Parameters:
      input - The input string to tokenize
      previousTokenizer - The previous tokenizer that is requesting this tokenization. If this is the first call to this method, this may be null

    • getTokenizedCommands

      @NotNull public @NotNull List<@NotNull Command> getTokenizedCommands()
      Returns a list of all tokenized Sub-Commands children of ParsingStateBase.command. (Including the current)

      Note that a Command only has a single tokenized Sub-Command, so this will have one Command per nesting level.

    • getTokenizedSubCommand

      @Nullable public @Nullable Command getTokenizedSubCommand()
      Returns the tokenized Sub-Command of ParsingStateBase.command.

    • getFinalTokens

      @NotNull public @NotNull List<@NotNull Token> getFinalTokens()
      Returns the list of all tokens that have been tokenized.

    • getInputString

      public String getInputString()
      Returns the input string that is being tokenized.
